attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is to stop people comming to this country and claim money from our taxes to live here free! you cant go to australia with no money so why come here?? our fathers and forfathers made this country for us to live in not for others to have a free ride on us!it shuld stop!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
